Job Title: Hiring::Staff Software Development Engineer, WiFi Mesh
Job Description: Roles and Responsibilities  Staff Software Development Engineer, WiFi Mesh Responsibilities::We are the WiFi mesh SW team in WiFi business line. Our target is to change the way consumers use Internet in their homes, by moving from a single gateway device to a fully connected distributed mesh system that will enable full home coverage and better user experience. The solution developed by the team is based on controller / agent application which optimizes the WiFi channels and topology over the mesh network and responsible to steer clients smoothly between devices and radios. It is now in stages of adapting to the WFA WiFi EasyMesh standard and was recently chosen by the open source PRPL foundation, providing the opportunity for the team to act as the maintainers of a big scale open source project. As a software engineer in our team, you will participate in multidisciplinary open source projects (PrplMesh, hostapd, openwrt, and more) and collaborate with other members in the open source community in the design, development, implementation, and certification of the EasyMesh standard. So if you're smart, highly motivated, think outside the box and are passionate about design and development of a large scale distributed system - your place is with us!Qualifications::Excellent C programming skillsMust have Object-oriented C++ programming skillsGood knowledge of 802.11, mesh and security protocolsGood knowledge of networking protocolsBash/Linux shell, python experienceEmbedded Linux development experienceBS in Electrical Engineering, Electronics or Computer Science +8 years of experience, or MS + 5 years of experience, or Ph.D. + 3 years of experienceDesired Candidate Profile Perks and Benefits
